medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset epigastric pain after eating a banana and drinking milk.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in the morning after eating. The pain was sharp, initially abated but returned. Patient reported chills, nausea without vomiting, normal bowel movements, and no diarrhea or melena. No previous similar episodes.
medical_history.family_history: Sister had her gall bladder removed.
